title: Amphenomenon
author: Amphenomenon
content: Casascius physical bitcoins was created by Mike Caldwell in 2011 until 2013. Mike Caldwell got the name CasasciusÂ  from an acronym "Call a Spade a Spade". This physical bitcoin are produced in 1, 10, 25, 100, 1000 BTC and it was made in way that the first person to get the private key from the coin collect the bitcoin.Casascius physical bitcoinsQuestion This are in limited copy and only few are still available. I will like to know if there have been any one who has seen one and if there have ever been one in Nigeria?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: It is worth knowing that Casascius bitcoin is no more produced since 2013. FINCEN caused it. Quote from: Amphenomenon on August 08, 2023, 01:00:35 PMI will like to know if there have been any one who has seen one and if there have ever been one in Nigeria? I have not seen it before and I do not need it. But some people may like collectibles. The best way for me is still the use of cold wallet.
